original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Coinciding with the Navy Anniversary, 1877 senior and junior sailors were advanced to their next higher rates at the recommendation of the Commander of the Navy, effective from 09th December.
Thus, 489, 264, 625, and 499 senior and junior sailors were advanced to the Ordinary Seaman, Able Seaman, Leading Seaman and Chief Petty Officer rates respectively.
The State and Public service trade unions collective plans to go on sick leave tomorrow.
A person who illegally imported a consignment of foreign cigarettes into the island arrested at BIA.
A fire has broken out at the Methsiri Sewana building in the Anuradhapura Teaching Hospital
State Minister of Defence says security at the Mihintale sacred site was not removed
